title: Towards the Cherry Blossoms!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Waaah, this park is starting to look really nice too nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>A few have started blooming, and a bunch more that are just about there. I guess we should prepare for the flower viewing party soon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You-san, Rin knows other rivers and parks with rows of cherry blossoms nya. Let’s go check them out too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Sure, let’s find ourselves a good spot.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Since we have to hurry up with the plan, should we run there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh? Well, I don’t think we need to come up with one that quickly.... But I guess a little bit of training alongside surveying the locations for the party doesn’t hurt.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It’s getting warmer, and the flowers are blooming. Rin can’t sit still nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, you’re just like a kid, Rin-chan~. But okay, I’ll go along with you! Alright, and go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, that’s not fair nya! Rin too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Full speed ahead towards the cherry blossoms, Yousoro~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
